interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/08/21
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
Review Text: I really like this face wash. I've used it just in my hands to wash my face really quickly, and I've also used it with my facial cleansing brush to get a deeper clean. It smells amazing. It has a thicker consistency and lathers, which I really like because it makes my face feel extra clean. Would buy this again!
Review Title: Would repurchase!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Preference**: While the user has a strong inclination towards Caudalie products, they have also shown a willingness to explore and appreciate effective offerings from other brands, such as Higher Education Skincare.
- **Skin Sensitivity**: Continuously prioritizing products suitable for sensitive skin, underscoring a commitment to gentle and safe ingredients for their skincare routine.
- **Product Formulation**: Enjoys liquid formulations that contribute to a thorough yet gentle cleansing experience, indicating an appreciation for functional and effective product textures.
- **Convenience**: Values travel-friendly product sizes (mini kits), reflecting a lifestyle that prioritizes portability and ease of use.
- **Fragrance**: Enjoys products with pleasant scents, highlighting a strong preference for sensory experiences in their beauty routine.
- **Quality Standards**: Consistently reviews and chooses high-quality products, as demonstrated by high ratings, showing discerning taste and a focus on effective performance.

Overall, the user is health-conscious, prioritizing effective skincare for sensitive skin, while remaining open to high-quality products from various trusted brands. Their preference for pleasant scents and convenient formulations continues to shape their skincare journey.
